name: Never Go Home
description:
Lost in the clutches of the endless void of space the experimental starship the Aeternum has suffered a critical meltdown. You must join the crew in their struggle to survive. Explore vast procedurally generated galaxies, full of planets, moons, asteroids, wormholes, and black holes. Fight the minions of the unholy twilight and rescue your stranded crew from far off worlds.

Featuring:
- 100 ways to die!
- 50 different crew personalities!
- Giant boss battles!

Make it back, or die in space!
